Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Apiece \A*piece"\, adv. [Pref. a- + piece.] Each by itself; by the single one; to each; as the share of each; as, these melons cost a shilling apiece. ``Fined . . . a thousand pounds apiece.'' --Hume. [1913 Webster]
apiece adv : to or from every one of two or more (considered individually); "they received $10 each" [syn: {each}, {to each one}, {for each one}, {from each one}]
